### Microplastic Site Monitoring and Evaluation

#### Solicitation Information

| Information | Description |
|-------------|-------------|
| Solicitation Number | 23-58029/B |
| Amendment Number | 8 |
| Publication Date | 2023-12-04 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2024-01-11T14:00:00 (Expired) |
| Expected Contract Start Date | 2024-01-11 |
| Expected Contract End Date | 2027-03-31 |

#### Tender Description

The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) is developing a decision support tool to inform policy makers and stakeholders on developing business opportunities in the circular economy. The tool will utilize numerical modeling to assess the distribution and fate of microplastics in Canadian marine ecosystems.

To validate the numerical model, the NRC requires sampling from up to five evaluation sites, which will be determined in collaboration with stakeholders. The sampling must be conducted in the following locations: Fraser River, Ottawa River, Atlantic Ocean, Pacific Ocean, and Arctic Ocean.

#### Tender Requirements

The NRC is seeking proposals from contractors to conduct microplastic site monitoring and evaluation at the specified locations. The successful contractor will be responsible for collecting and analyzing samples, conducting surveys and assessments, and providing recommendations to inform the decision support tool development.

#### Important Details

* Competitive - Open Bidding procurement method.
* No trade agreements are limited to this opportunity.
* Contracting Entity: National Research Council of Canada.
